form_fields.name: multiple_i3_applications
form_fields.label: Have you applied for more than one i3 grant?

form_fields.name: absolute_priority
form_fields.label: Select the ONE Absolute Priority (AP) that you are addressing in your application

form_fields.name: competitive_preference_priorities
form_fields.label: Select up to two Competitive Preference Priorities (CPP) that you are addressing in your application
options: CPP 6: Innovations for Improving Early Learning Outcomes (zero or one point)
CPP 7: Innovations that Support College Access and Success (zero or one point)
CPP 8: Innovations to Address the Unique Learning Needs of Students with Disabilities and Limited English Proficient Students (zero or one Point)
CPP 9: Improving Productivity (zero or one point)

form_fields.name: total_students_served
form_fields.label: Total number of students to be served by the proposed project

form_fields.name: grade_levels_served
form_fields.label: Student grade levels to be served by the proposed project (select all that apply):

form_fields.name: project_description
form_fields.label: Project description
form_fields.description: In 2000 characters or less, please provide a brief description of the project you wish to propose. Be sure to include a summary of project objectives and expected outcomes, along with any special project features.
